channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Israel-Iran War LIVE Updates: Israel Strikes More "Military Targets" In Iran, US Issues Global Alert

media:content.media:description: Israel-Iran War LIVE: US bombed three Iranian nuclear sites on Sunday.

item.description: US-Israel-Iran Conflict LIVE Updates: The United States carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear sites in Iran, President Donald Trump said.
item.content:encoded: US-Israel-Iran Conflict LIVE Updates: The United States carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear sites in Iran, President Donald Trump said.

item.title: When Did Trump Decide To Attack Iran? Vance Says Minutes Before Bomb Dropped

media:content.media:description: President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance sitting in the Situation Room.

item.description: US President Donald Trump made the final decision to launch strikes on Iranian nuclear sites "minutes before the bombs dropped," Vice President JD Vance said on Saturday, CNN reported.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump made the final decision to launch strikes on Iranian nuclear sites "minutes before the bombs dropped," Vice President JD Vance said on Saturday, CNN reported.

item.title: "Why Wouldn't There Be Regime Change?" Trump's 'MIGA' Message For Iran

media:content.media:description: Trump, in a televised address, called the strikes "a spectacular military success",

item.description: US President Donald Trump on Sunday questioned the possibility of regime change in Iran following U.S. military strikes against key Iran military sites over the weekend.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump on Sunday questioned the possibility of regime change in Iran following U.S. military strikes against key Iran military sites over the weekend.

item.title: Entrances To Tunnels At Iran's Isfahan Nuclear Site Hit By US Strike: UN Watchdog

media:content.media:description: Entrances to underground tunnels at the site were impacted, the IAEA said.

item.description: Entrances to tunnels used to store part of Iran's enriched uranium stockpile at the sprawling Isfahan nuclear complex were hit in US military strikes overnight, the UN nuclear watchdog said on Sunday.
item.content:encoded: Entrances to tunnels used to store part of Iran's enriched uranium stockpile at the sprawling Isfahan nuclear complex were hit in US military strikes overnight, the UN nuclear watchdog said on Sunday.

item.title: 'Fighting Will Stop Once...': Netanyahu On Israel-Iran Conflict

media:content.media:description: We are moving step by step towards achieving our goals, said Netanyahu.

item.description: Israel was very close to meeting its goals in Iran of removing the threats of ballistic missiles and the nuclear programme, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday.
item.content:encoded: Israel was very close to meeting its goals in Iran of removing the threats of ballistic missiles and the nuclear programme, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday.

item.title: Suicide Bomber Kills 20 In Syrian Church Near Damascus During Mass

media:content.media:description: Security forces and first-responders rushed to the church.

item.description: A suicide bomber in Syria opened fire then detonated an explosive vest inside a Greek Orthodox church filled with people praying on Sunday, killing at least 20 and wounding 52 others, state media reported.
item.content:encoded: A suicide bomber in Syria opened fire then detonated an explosive vest inside a Greek Orthodox church filled with people praying on Sunday, killing at least 20 and wounding 52 others, state media reported.

item.title: Advisory Warns Of 'Heightened Threat Environment' In US After Iran Strikes

media:content.media:description: Anti-war demonstration in Los Angeles, California, US.

item.description: An advisory from the US Department of Homeland Security warned of a "heightened threat environment in the United States" following overnight US military strikes on Iran's nuclear sites.
item.content:encoded: An advisory from the US Department of Homeland Security warned of a "heightened threat environment in the United States" following overnight US military strikes on Iran's nuclear sites.

item.title: Bangladesh Opposition Files Case Over Alleged Poll Rigging

media:content.media:description: BNP said Sheikh Hasina's party candidates were wrongly declared winners. (File)

item.description: Bangladesh's leading political party filed a case Sunday against former election commissioners it accuses of rigging past polls to keep now-ousted autocrat Sheikh Hasina in power.
item.content:encoded: Bangladesh's leading political party filed a case Sunday against former election commissioners it accuses of rigging past polls to keep now-ousted autocrat Sheikh Hasina in power.

item.title: "Economic Suicide": Marco Rubio On Possible Strait Of Hormuz Closure By Iran
item.description: Marco Rubio said a move to close the strait would be a massive escalation that would merit a response from the US and others.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/956087/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>Marco Rubio said a move to close the strait would be a massive escalation that would merit a response from the US and others.

item.title: Exclusive: Atomic Agency Veteran Warns of Global Nuclear Risk After US Attack On Iran

media:content.media:description: Peter Rickwood said full impact of US attack on Iran's nuclear sites would take time to assess

item.description: In a significant escalation of geopolitical tensions, the US launched a targeted military strike on Iran's nuclear facilities, raising global concerns about the potential fallout and future implications.
item.content:encoded: In a significant escalation of geopolitical tensions, the US launched a targeted military strike on Iran's nuclear facilities, raising global concerns about the potential fallout and future implications.

item.title: Top Democrats Not Briefed Before US Strikes On Iranian Nuclear Sites: Report

media:content.media:description: The Israel-Iran conflict, now in its 10th day, intensified as the US entered the battlefield. (File)

item.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer and House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries were reportedly notified after the bombs had dropped.
item.content:encoded: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer and House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries were reportedly notified after the bombs had dropped.

item.title: Deception, Decoys: Inside Op Midnight Hammer That Targeted Iran Nuke Sites

media:content.media:description: The main strike package had seven B-2 Spirit bombers

item.description: The US military today explained how exactly the operation to bomb three nuclear sites in Iran unfolded. B-2 stealth aircraft dropped bunker-buster bombs on a fortified nuclear facility, while submarine-launched cruise missiles hit two other sites.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/956098/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>The US military today explained how exactly the operation to bomb three nuclear sites in Iran unfolded. B-2 stealth aircraft dropped bunker-buster bombs on a fortified nuclear facility, while submarine-launched cruise missiles hit two other sites.

item.title: Arab States Condemn US Strikes On Iran, Warn Of Regional Escalation

media:content.media:description: US President Donald Trump described the attack on Iran as a "spectacular military success".

item.description: Arab countries on Sunday strongly condemned the US air strikes on nuclear facilities in Iran, warning of serious repercussions and calling for a return to diplomacy.
item.content:encoded: Arab countries on Sunday strongly condemned the US air strikes on nuclear facilities in Iran, warning of serious repercussions and calling for a return to diplomacy.

item.title: US Strikes On Iran Nuclear Sites Are Real-Life Test Of Hard Power's Limits

media:content.media:description: US struck Isfahan, where officials said much of Iran's most highly enriched uranium was stored.(File)

item.description: US military strikes overnight in which President Donald Trump said Iran's main nuclear sites were "obliterated" will put to the test the widely held view that such attacks can delay a nuclear programme but not kill a determined push for atom bombs.
item.content:encoded: US military strikes overnight in which President Donald Trump said Iran's main nuclear sites were "obliterated" will put to the test the widely held view that such attacks can delay a nuclear programme but not kill a determined push for atom bombs.

item.title: How Iran Is Likely To Respond To US Strikes

media:content.media:description: US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said the strikes devastated the Iranian nuclear programme.(File)

item.description: The United States' strikes on Iranian nuclear sites raised two major questions: how effective were they, and what will Iran do next?
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/955922/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>The United States' strikes on Iranian nuclear sites raised two major questions: how effective were they, and what will Iran do next?

item.title: Pics: Rare Snow Hits Parts Of US In Summer, Internet Calls It "Pure Magic"
item.description: The NWS stated that snow totals could top out at 12 to 18 inches at elevations above 6,000 feet near Glacier National Park.
item.content:encoded: The NWS stated that snow totals could top out at 12 to 18 inches at elevations above 6,000 feet near Glacier National Park.

item.title: Israeli Forces Recover Bodies Of Three Hostages From Gaza

media:content.media:description: 50 hostages now remain in Gaza, only 20 of whom are believed to be alive.

item.description: Israeli forces have recovered the bodies of three hostages which had been held in the Gaza Strip since the Palestinian group Hamas' 2023 attack, the military and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said.
item.content:encoded: Israeli forces have recovered the bodies of three hostages which had been held in the Gaza Strip since the Palestinian group Hamas' 2023 attack, the military and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said.

item.title: After US Strikes, Iran Plans To Close Oil Corridor Strait Of Hormuz: Report

media:content.media:description: Iran is looking to close key oil shipping route Strait of Hormuz

item.description: Iran is considering closing the key oil shipping route Strait of Hormuz after the US bombed three of its nuclear facilities, Iranian media reported today.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/956006/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>Iran is considering closing the key oil shipping route Strait of Hormuz after the US bombed three of its nuclear facilities, Iranian media reported today.

item.title: Despite Clashes With US Presidents, Netanyahu Usually Gets His Way

media:content.media:description: Netanyahu has consistently pushed for military intervention in Iran.

item.description: A little over a month ago, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appeared to have been shunted to the shadows by US President Donald Trump, who hopscotched the Middle East without visiting Israel, traditionally Washington's closest regional ally.
item.content:encoded: A little over a month ago, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appeared to have been shunted to the shadows by US President Donald Trump, who hopscotched the Middle East without visiting Israel, traditionally Washington's closest regional ally.

item.title: United Behind Iran War Effort, Israelis Express Relief At US Bombing

media:content.media:description: Israel's usually divided political scene has also lined up behind the attack on Iran.

item.description: Israelis expressed relief and optimism after US President Donald Trump ordered air strikes on Iran, 10 days into a war that has widespread public support.
item.content:encoded: Israelis expressed relief and optimism after US President Donald Trump ordered air strikes on Iran, 10 days into a war that has widespread public support.
